items.sentence: Tom and I had a long conversation while we were waiting for Mary.
Tom and Mary were speaking loud enough for John to overhear them.
I\'m just trying to figure out why someone would do such a thing.
I\'m not going to sit here and listen to you complaining all day.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom is feeling better today than yesterday.
I\'m pretty sure this book has never been translated into French.
They failed to take into account the special needs of old people.
They had to change their schedule because the train arrived late.
Tom is able to say "I can only speak French" in thirty languages.
Some people describe Tom as a cross between Robin Hood and Zorro.
I\'m a vegetarian, so I\'d rather not have meat, if that\'s okay.
I started last in the race, but I soon caught up with the others.
Tom says Mary doesn\'t have to stay here if she doesn\'t want to.
It didn\'t surprise me at all that Tom couldn\'t afford a lawyer.
It\'s difficult to teach people what they\'re unwilling to learn.
Tom told me that the medicine he was taking didn\'t seem to help.
Tom couldn\'t think of any reasons why Mary wouldn\'t want to go.
Tom didn\'t know that I couldn\'t do what he was asking me to do.
Tom didn\'t know that he shouldn\'t believe everything Mary said.
Just stick around a few days and you\'ll come to love this place.
